content: The Spirit of Captain Void-Illusion is one of the Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong's The New West region. This is the only Spirit in The New West that isn't obtained by killing a boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Spirit_of_Captain_Void-Illusion.md', within the main section titled 'The Spirit of Captain Void-Illusion'.
The content is as follows:
The Spirit of Captain Void-Illusion is one of the Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong's The New West region. This is the only Spirit in The New West that isn't obtained by killing a boss.
